main event: On 31 May 1949, two objects resembling radio transcription discs were found in a cornfield in Parma, Michigan.
interesting points: The objects were discovered sticking three inches into the ground,One object had a piece of purple colored plastic attached to it,The investigation concluded that the objects were likely radio transcription discs used by a local radio station,There was no photographic evidence provided in the report,The sighting was reported by a civilian source and involved local news.
witness description: A civilian who found the objects while farming.
